fr.liglab.adele.icasa.application
Interface ApplicationManager

public interface ApplicationManager

Represents root access to applications and unique way to install and uninstall applications.

Author:
Thomas Leveque

Method Summary
 void addApplicationListener(ApplicationTracker listener)
          Adds an application listener.
 Application getApplication(String applicationId)
          Returns the specified application.
 Application getApplicationOfBundle(String bundleSymbolicName)
          Returns application which corresponds to specified bundle.
 List<Application> getApplications()
          Returns all installed applications.
 List<ApplicationCategory> getCategories()
          Returns ordered list of application categories.
 boolean isApplicationBundle(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
          Returns true if specified bundle is part of an application.
 void removeApplicationListener(ApplicationTracker listener)
          Removes an application listener.
 

Method Detail

getCategories

List<ApplicationCategory> getCategories()
Returns ordered list of application categories. If there is no category, returns an empty list.

Returns:
ordered list of application categories.

getApplications

List<Application> getApplications()
Returns all installed applications. If there is no installed application, returns an empty list.

Returns:
all installed applications.

getApplication

Application getApplication(String applicationId)
Returns the specified application.

Parameters:
applicationId - id of requested application
Returns:
the specified application.

addApplicationListener

void addApplicationListener(ApplicationTracker listener)
Adds an application listener.

Parameters:
listener - an application listener

removeApplicationListener

void removeApplicationListener(ApplicationTracker listener)
Removes an application listener.

Parameters:
listener - an application listener

getApplicationOfBundle

Application getApplicationOfBundle(String bundleSymbolicName)
Returns application which corresponds to specified bundle. Returns null if no such application exists.

Parameters:
bundleSymbolicName - bundle symbolic name
Returns:
application which corresponds to specified bundle.

isApplicationBundle

boolean isApplicationBundle(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
Returns true if specified bundle is part of an application.

Parameters:
bundle - a Bundle
Returns:
true if specified bundle is part of an application.
